from sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, usercode, realname, username, password, hobby, myself, birthday, gender, phone, salt, locked, email, create_time, last_login_time, sourceimg ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myself,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sourceimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
